sub_topic: Finding eigenvalues and eigenvectors of a matrix using power iteration method
message_1:
Consider the matrix 

$$
A = \begin{pmatrix}
3 & -1 \\
4 & -2 \\
\end{pmatrix}
$$

Use the Power Iteration Method to find the dominant eigenvalue and its corresponding eigenvector of the matrix $A$ with an initial guess of $\begin{pmatrix} 1 \\ 1 \end{pmatrix}$.
